label: RBD params
helptext: Parameters for Rados Block Device Volume

subfields.name: fsType
subfields.label: Filesystem Type
subfields.helptext: The type of the filesystem, eg: 'ext4', 'xfs', 'ntfs'

subfields.name: keyring
subfields.label: Keyring
subfields.helptext: Keyring is the path to key ring for RBDUser. Default is /etc/ceph/keyring.

subfields.name: pool
subfields.label: Pool Name
subfields.helptext: The rados pool name. Default is rbd.

subfields.name: secretRef
subfields.label: Secret Reference
subfields.helptext: SecretRef is name of the authentication secret for RBDUser. If provided overrides keyring. Default is nil.

subfields.name: name
subfields.label: Name of secret
subfields.helptext: The name of the kubernetes secret.

subfields.name: user
subfields.label: User
subfields.helptext: User is the rados user name, default is admin.

subfields.name: readOnly
subfields.label: Read Only
subfields.helptext: Enabling it will force the ReadOnly property in VolumeMounts.
